title: The Terminator
description: In 2029, a soldier travels back to 1984 to stop a cyborg sent to kill a woman whose unborn son will lead humanity against machines. This battle shapes the future of mankind's survival.

title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly, a teenager, travels 30 years into the past in a DeLorean time machine created by Doc Brown, encountering his parents' high school lives and trying to ensure his future.

title: Jurassic Park
description: An entrepreneur builds a dinosaur theme park using prehistoric DNA. Before its grand opening, the dinosaurs break free, putting visitors' lives in danger, leading to chaos and suspense.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers his reality is a simulated world controlled by machines. Joining a rebellion, he learns about his true role in the fight for humanity's freedom against the machines.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief who steals secrets through dream-sharing is tasked with planting an idea into a CEO's mind, navigating complex dreams to achieve what seems impossible.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The intertwining stories of hitmen, a boxer, a mobster, and bandits unfold in a series of violent and darkly comedic vignettes, exploring themes of redemption and consequence.

title: The Dark Knight
description: As Gotham faces chaos with the Joker's rise, Batman confronts intense challenges to protect the city, testing his limits and forcing him to confront moral and ethical dilemmas.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac and a soap salesman create an underground fight club as a form of male therapy, leading to chaotic consequences and a journey toward self-destruction and rebellion.

title: Shawshank Redemption
description: In prison, two inmates bond over years, finding solace in friendship and hope, leading to redemption and an eventual escape that transcends the brutality of their environment.

title: Forrest Gump
description: A simple man recounts his extraordinary life, intersecting with historical events, while his love for his childhood sweetheart guides him through triumphs and tribulations.

title: The Godfather
description: Michael Corleone, son of a mafia don, is drawn into the family business after an assassination attempt on his father, setting off a cycle of violence and power struggles.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV
description: Young Luke Skywalker teams with a Jedi, a pilot, a Wookiee, and droids to fight the Empire, aiming to destroy a deadly space station and rescue Princess Leia.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring
description: Frodo Baggins and his companions embark on a quest to destroy the One Ring, facing dark forces and the looming threat of Sauronâ€™s power.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: As Frodo and Sam head for Mordor with Gollum's help, their allies prepare to battle Saruman's forces, seeking to protect Middle-earth from dark powers.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: As Frodo and Sam near Mordor, Gandalf and Aragorn rally men to distract Sauron, aiming to protect Middle-earth and destroy the One Ring in the heart of Mount Doom.

title: Star Wars: Episode V
description: The Rebels face defeat by the Empire on Hoth. Luke Skywalker seeks Jedi training with Yoda as his friends evade Darth Vader's relentless pursuit across the galaxy.

title: Gladiator
description: After Emperor Marcus Aurelius dies, his son Commodus seizes the throne. General Maximus escapes execution, becomes a gladiator, and seeks vengeance for his family's murder.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following D-Day, a squad of U.S. soldiers is sent to find and bring back a paratrooper whose brothers died in combat, facing harrowing battles across enemy lines.

title: Braveheart
description: William Wallace leads a Scottish rebellion against England to free his homeland from King Edward I's rule, inspiring his people through courage and determination.

title: Schindler's List
description: In WWII Poland, industrialist Oskar Schindler saves his Jewish workers from Nazi persecution, turning his factory into a haven and risking everything for their safety.

title: Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet enlists the help of Hannibal Lecter, a brilliant but jailed killer, to catch another serial murderer, diving into a chilling psychological battle.

title: Goodfellas
description: The rise and fall of mob associate Henry Hill, detailing his life in the Italian-American crime syndicate and the personal and professional consequences of his choices.

title: The Lion King
description: Young lion Simba is cast out by his uncle Scar, who seeks the throne. Guided by new friends, Simba returns to reclaim his destiny and restore balance to his kingdom.

title: Toy Story
description: Woody, a cowboy doll, feels threatened when Buzz Lightyear, a space action figure, replaces him as the favorite toy. Together, they embark on an adventure to find their place.

title: Finding Nemo
description: Marlin, a clownfish, braves the ocean to find his son, Nemo, who has been captured and placed in a fish tank. With Dory's help, he encounters dangers and makes allies.

title: Shrek
description: An ogre named Shrek sets out to rescue Princess Fiona to reclaim his swamp, embarking on a journey filled with unlikely friendships, magical creatures, and unexpected romance.

title: Up
description: Elderly Carl Fredricksen fulfills his dream of adventure by flying to South America in his house, accidentally bringing along a young stowaway named Russell for a heartwarming journey.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of superheroes struggles to live normal lives, but when called into action, they must work together to save the world from a new threat and embrace their powers.

title: WALLÂ·E
description: In the distant future, Earth has become a desolate wasteland, abandoned by humanity and overrun by mountains of trash. Amidst the rubble, a small, lovable robot named WALL-E spends his days tirelessly cleaning up the mess.
